subject: Re: Second Life
author: Misty
full_text:
Ahh yeah this pc's video aint the greatest either. Its good for basic 
things but will need a new hd soon. Bought the new one because  
figured I worked hard enough all year I deserve a newer one hehehe 
plus the price was too good to resist.

Misty

wrote:

> --- On Tue, 8/19/08, black bear hollow <blackbearhollow@
> <mailto:blackbearhollow%40gmail.com> gmail.com> wrote:
> 
> > From: black bear hollow <blackbearhollow@
> <mailto:blackbearhollow%40gmail.com> gmail.com>
> > Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Second Life
> > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups <mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com> .com
> > Date: Tuesday, August 19, 2008, 5:05 PM
> > No charge at all unless you own land or rent. You can
> > purchase 
> > different avatars, clothing, accessories, etc...
> > for your avatar. Second Life currency is called
> > "Lindens". You can by 
> > quite a lot of lindens for a couple of bucks via Paypal.
> > You can also get many avatars and clothes, costumes, you
> > name it, for 
> > free. There are a lot of "freebie" type places on
> > SL.
> > 
> > For a long time, I got everything free and had a lot of fun
> > playing 
> > with my avatar. You can get pretty creative. I once saw
> > Jesus float by 
> > and angels were singing around him - it was a riot - and
> > later saw a 
> > very strange looking Elvis. You can be anything in SL.
> > 
> > Many different spiritual & metaphysical groups meet in
> > SL. They have 
> > places to meditate, talk, you name it. It's a lot of
> > fun to explore.
> > 
> > For a recording group, I was envisioning meeting once or
> > twice a month 
> > (or more) to discuss our research and perhaps even try to
> > record as a 
> > group... combine energies. Might be fun & interesting!
> > 
> > w.
> > On Aug 19, 2008, at 3:12 PM, Ron Lederer wrote:
> > 
> > >
> > > w. I checked out the site quickly. Looks like a
> > monthly charge is 
> > > involved or no? I will get back to it again when I
> > have more time. 
> > > What do you envision with a recording group...I might
> > be 
> > > interested? ron l
> > >
> > >
>
